code: export var UPDATE_PRODUCT='UPDATE_PRODUCT';export var UPDATE_PRODUCT_SUCCESS='UPDATE_PRODUCT_SUCCESS';export var UPDATE_PRODUCT_FAIL='UPDATE_PRODUCT_FAIL';export var UPDATE_PRODUCT_RESET='UPDATE_PRODUCT_RESET';export var updateProduct=function updateProduct(params){return{type:UPDATE_PRODUCT,params:params};};export var updateProductSuccess=function updateProductSuccess(response){return{type:UPDATE_PRODUCT_SUCCESS,response:response};};export var updateProductFail=function updateProductFail(response){return{type:UPDATE_PRODUCT_FAIL,response:response};};export var updateProductReset=function updateProductReset(){return{type:UPDATE_PRODUCT_RESET};};
